text:
"Christopher Robin" is an 2018 British-American fantasy adventure comedy-drama movie. It was directed by Marc Forster. It was written by Tom McCarthy, Alex Ross Perry, and Allison Schroeder.
The movie is inspired by A. A. Milne's book "Winnie the Pooh". It is a live-action/CGI continuation of the Disney franchise of the same name.
The movie stars Ewan McGregor, Hayley Atwell, Bronte Carmichael and Mark Gatiss, along with the voices of Jim Cummings, Brad Garrett, Toby Jones, Nick Mohammed, Peter Capaldi and Sophie Okonedo.
"Christopher Robin" was released on August 3, 2018 by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures in the United States.
